name: Kabal
title: The Swift Assassin
subtitle: A lightning-fast warrior who uses his hook swords and superhuman speed to dominate the battlefield
lore: Once a member of the Black Dragon clan, Kabal's life changed forever when he was horrifically burned, requiring him to wear a respirator to survive. His near-death experience granted him incredible speed, which he now uses alongside his signature hook swords to strike fear into his enemies. Despite his fearsome appearance, Kabal fights with precision and deadly efficiency.

passive.name: Nomad's Speed
passive.description: Kabal can't be slowed and all MS buffs are [50%] more effective on him.

Q.name: Meat Hook
Q.description: Kabal uses his hooks to grab the hit enemy towards himself, slowing them by [30%] and breaking their Armor by [15%] for [5s]. This ability does not deal damage.

W.name: Spinner Winner
W.description: Kabal runs to the cursor's direction in [0.2s]. If he passes through enemies, he spins them (stun) for [1.5s].

E.name: Speedy Hands
E.description: When activated, Kabal gains [0.3/0.4/0.45/0.6/0.8] AS for [4s]. His attacks also splash to nearby enemies, dealing [60%] AD damage.

R.name: Hide in Gas
R.description: Kabal creates smoke behind him as he is moving providing him stealth. The smoke lasts for [3s]. This ability's effect lasts for [8.5s]. During this ability, Kabal deals [15%] more damage.

1.name: Lethal Hooks
1.description: Meat Hook now deals 100% of Kabal's AD as damage when pulling an enemy and the slow is increased to 50%.

1.name: Swift Winds
1.description: Kabal's movement speed is increased by an additional 10%, and his basic attacks grant 10% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds (stacking up to 3 times).

1.name: Tactical Retreat
1.description: Kabal runs [20%] faster if there are no enemies nearby.

5.name: Extended Chains
5.description: Increases the range of Meat Hook by 20%.

5.name: Quick Hands
5.description: Speedy Hands now also grants 8% increased attack damage for its duration, and the attack speed bonus lasts 1 second longer.

10.name: Toxic Mist
10.description: Hide in Gas now poisons enemies who enter the smoke, dealing 1.25% of their maximum health as magic damage per second for the duration of the smoke.

10.name: Vanishing Act
10.description: Hide in Gas's cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds, and the first attack out of stealth deals 50% bonus damage.

15.name: Iron Grip
15.description: Meat Hook now roots the target for 1.5 seconds after the pull.

15.name: Blender Mode
15.description: Spinner Winner can now be recast within 2 seconds to dash again, but it can't stun enemies anymore.

15.name: Overdrive
15.description: Speedy Hands now doubles Kabal's attack speed instead, however Kabal loses 20% of his AD at LVL15.

20.name: Unstoppable Force
20.description: Kabal gains a magic shield, which negates the first CC and its damage [35s cooldown].

20.name: Reaper's Hooks
20.description: Each enemy hooked increases Kabal's attack damage by 15% for 5 seconds.

20.name: Gas Cloud
20.description: Hide in Gas now creates a larger smoke cloud that follows Kabal's movements, affecting a wider area and lasting 2 seconds longer. Enemies inside the smoke have their vision greatly reduced.

20.name: Vortex Slash
20.description: Spinner Winner now creates a vortex that pulls nearby enemies towards Kabal during the spin.

weaknesses: Vulnerable when abilities are on cooldown
